data.message: Marshall, be not afraid to bring us! We solve it how to drive the life. We very much respect you and we won't in empty blame you. Know, you help us! Each your part, each your step, a voice - us inspire. For example, you help me even through screens! I didn't see you in life... Forgive, there is no opportunity even to visit concerts. It is possible to tell that I work but I earn very little though with only.... Know, you not one - we at you are!!!!!
